One of the most important ones is \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://time.epam.com/journal/4060741400006108536/from=2022-01-31&to=2022-02-06\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", which is used for reporting your work. You can report your work hours via Jira or customer applications, as they are synchronized with time.epam.com.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Explore how to report your time from your first days at EPAM Anywhere program\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you have no project yet\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the onboarding activities, including passing onboarding modules, English Assessment, profile completion at people.epam.com, and interviews, should be tracked as Non-project activities (NPA) and reported to the corresponding tab at time.epam.com. To do that, you must report 4 hours per day for part-time employment (0.5 of full-time employment) and 8 hours per day for full-time employment. Please note that there is no need to log time in gray cells (as holidays and weekends are marked with gray).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you have a project assignment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you get a project, all your hours should be reported in the Projects tab on Time.epam.com.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about how to report onboarding activities when you have a project, ask your Project Manager. Names and contacts of your Project Leads can be found in your Telescope profile in the “Workload by Project” widget.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All types of leaves must be requested at with time.epam.com automatically.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn more about time reporting, watch a
